name: Crash Test Dummies: The Ghosts That Haunt Me Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "Superman's Song", what other literary figure is mentioned?
questions.explanation:
Tarzan.

	The song compares Tarzan and Superman, who had recently died. While Tarzan wasn't a ladies man, Clark Kent was a real gent.

questions.text: Complete the title: "Comin' Home Soon (The ___________ Man's Song)
questions.explanation:
Bereft.

	"I've all my wisdom teethTwo up top, two beneathAnd yet I'll recognizeMy mouth says things that aren't so wiseBut when I sing my darling's praiseI know I'm right, or close anywaysFor she's a gem upon this earthI know to me she will return."

questions.text: Which villain is mentioned in "Superman's Song"?
questions.explanation:
Solomon Grundy.

	Solomon Grundy isn't known for fighting Superman, but they did face off once, with the Last Son of Krypton coming out on top.

questions.text: In "The Country Life", where could the singer and his darling be happy?
questions.explanation:
In the country.

	Obviously, the couple would be happiest in the country, where they could breakfast on eggs they picked themselves. According to the singer, the city is killing their love.

questions.text: Complete the song title: "Here on Earth (I'll Have My ________)
questions.explanation:
cake.

	"Here on earth I'll have my cakeGonna eat it too, make no mistake'Cause if it's a question of to be or not to be,I'll put on my boots and go see what I can see."

questions.text: In "The Ghosts That Haunt Me", how many skeletons does the singer have in his closet?
questions.explanation:
One or two.

	"There's a skeleton in everybody's closetI can think of one or two in my own roomBut I would like to introduce them both to youYou'd shake their bony hands and so dispell the gloom."

questions.text: Is this the right lyric from 'Thick-Necked Man'?: "We're talkin' about a thick necked man in the city/Build a pub a blood and sweat."
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	"We're talkin' about a thick necked man in the cityBuild a pub a blood and sweatSwears by God he'll stand by justiceHe ain't stood by justice yetHe gets them drunk and gets their moneyThey cash their welfare checks for stoutNow he throws them into the streetHe's sucked you in, he'll spit you out."

questions.text: In "Androgynous", Dick is wearing a skirt.
questions.explanation:
True.

	"Here comes Dick, he's wearing a skirtHere comes Jane you know she's sportin' a chainSame hair, a revolutionSame build, evolutionTomorrow who's gonna fuss?And they love each other so, androgynousCloser than you know, love each other so, androgynous." "Androgynous" was made into a music video, with the band peforming at a fair where many gneder-bending people were in attendance.

questions.text: Which one of these songs was not released as a single?
questions.explanation:
Thick-Necked Man.

	"Thick-Necked Man" was not released as a single. All others were made into music videos, with "The Ghosts That Haunt Me" featuring hand puppets.

questions.text: In "The Voyage", the singer is not in love with his travelling partner.
questions.explanation:
True.

	"It may be that I'd like toBut I won't fall in love with youWe won't spend the rest of our lives togetherBut anyway couldn't we go on a trip together."
